mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image_item ( item_name, price, description, picture_url ) VALUES ( #{itemName}, #{price}, #{description}, #{pictureUrl} )
mapper.select: SELECT item_id, item_name, price, description, picture_url FROM image_item WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
SELECT item_id, item_name, price, description, picture_url FROM image_item WHERE item_id > 0 ORDER BY item_id DESC
